name: A.P.G INTERNATIONAL AVIATION ACADEMY, INC.
about: APG International Aviation Academy Inc. is a premier flight school in the Philippines, operating since 1999. Located at Subic Bay International Airport, we offer comprehensive programs including Private Pilot License, Commercial Pilot License, Instrument Rating, and Multi Engine Rating. Accredited by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines (CAAP) and the Director General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) Indonesia, we ensure high standards of quality, safety, and timeliness. Our facility is equipped with a high-class flight simulator and certified maintenance facilities, ensuring safe and airworthy aircraft. We provide all-inclusive packages that cover licensing, accommodation, meals, and visa assistance. With a fleet of 15 aircraft and a low student-to-instructor ratio, we are committed to helping you achieve your dream of becoming a professional pilot.
